entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 07 January 2023
